title: RBI keeps repo rate unchanged
summary: The RBI has maintained the repo rate, signalling a stable monetary policy stance amid inflation concerns. This impacts borrowing costs and financial planning.

title: GST Council issues clarification on ITC eligibility
summary: A new clarification has been issued on Input Tax Credit eligibility, impacting compliance and credit claims for registered taxpayers.

title: MCA notifies amendments to Companies (Accounts) Rules
summary: The Ministry of Corporate Affairs has notified amendments affecting disclosure and compliance requirements under the Companies Act.
